list.name: (start)
list.query: select text,generatorHost,application,title FROM (select text from events where $timeFilter and "text" =~ /.*started$/ GROUP BY generatorHost,application,title)

list.name: (stop)
list.query: select "text", "generatorHost", "application" FROM (select text from events where $timeFilter and "text" =~ /.*ended$/ GROUP BY  "generatorHost", "application")

targets.query:
SELECT "host", top("factor", 1) FROM
(SELECT (sum("duration_sum")*sum("calls_sum")) as "factor" FROM "$archive"."pg_stat_statements_query_md5_10m" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY "host")

SELECT top("${TOP_by}", ${TOP}), "Calls", "Total", "Rows","Mean", "datname", "usename", "queryid", "query_md5" FROM 
(
SELECT sum("calls_sum") AS "Calls", sum("duration_sum") AS "Total", sum("rows_sum") AS "Rows", sum("duration_sum")  / sum("calls_sum") AS "Mean" FROM "$archive"."pg_stat_statements_query_md5_10m" WHERE ("datname" =~ /^${datname:regex}$/ AND "host" =~ /^${host:regex}$/ AND "usename" =~ /^${usename:regex}$/) AND  $timeFilter GROUP BY "host", "datname", "usename", "queryid", "query_md5"
)

SELECT last("calls_sum") AS "XXXXX" FROM "1d"."pg_stat_statements_query_10m" WHERE ("datname" =~ /^${datname:regex}$/ AND "host" =~ /^${host:regex}$/ AND "query_md5" =~ /^${query_md5:regex}$/ AND "query" =~ /${filter:regex}/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1000d), "query_md5", "query"

SELECT last("calls_sum") AS "XXXXX" FROM "autogen"."pg_stat_statements_query_1d" WHERE ("datname" =~ /^${datname:regex}$/ AND "host" =~ /^${host:regex}$/ AND "query_md5" =~ /^${query_md5:regex}$/ AND "query" =~ /${filter:regex}/ AND "time" < now()-1d) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1000d), "query_md5", "query"

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT("host") FROM (SELECT last("calls_sum") FROM "${archive}"."pg_stat_statements_query_md5_10m"  WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY "host")
list.label: PostgreSQL host
list.name: host
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT("host") FROM (SELECT last("calls_sum") FROM "${archive}"."pg_stat_statements_query_md5_10m"  WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY "host")

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT("datname") FROM (SELECT last("calls_sum") FROM "${archive}"."pg_stat_statements_query_md5_10m" WHERE "host" =~ /^${host:regex}$/   AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "datname")
list.label: PostgreSQL DB
list.name: datname
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT("datname") FROM (SELECT last("calls_sum") FROM "${archive}"."pg_stat_statements_query_md5_10m" WHERE "host" =~ /^${host:regex}$/   AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "datname")

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT("usename") FROM (SELECT last("calls_sum") FROM "${archive}"."pg_stat_statements_query_md5_10m" WHERE "datname" =~ /^${datname:regex}$/ AND "host" =~ /^${host:regex}$/  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "usename")
list.label: PostgreSQL User
list.name: usename
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT("usename") FROM (SELECT last("calls_sum") FROM "${archive}"."pg_stat_statements_query_md5_10m" WHERE "datname" =~ /^${datname:regex}$/ AND "host" =~ /^${host:regex}$/  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "usename")

list.definition:
SELECT "query_md5", top("${TOP_by}", ${TOP}) FROM 
(
SELECT sum("calls_sum") AS "Calls", sum("duration_sum") AS "Total", sum("rows_sum") AS "Rows", sum("duration_sum")  / sum("calls_sum") AS "Mean" FROM "$archive"."pg_stat_statements_query_md5_10m" WHERE ("datname" =~ /^${datname:regex}$/ AND "host" =~ /^${host:regex}$/ AND "usename" =~ /^${usename:regex}$/) AND  $timeFilter GROUP BY "host", "datname", "usename", "queryid", "query_md5"
)
list.label: query_md5
list.name: query_md5
list.query:
SELECT "query_md5", top("${TOP_by}", ${TOP}) FROM 
(
SELECT sum("calls_sum") AS "Calls", sum("duration_sum") AS "Total", sum("rows_sum") AS "Rows", sum("duration_sum")  / sum("calls_sum") AS "Mean" FROM "$archive"."pg_stat_statements_query_md5_10m" WHERE ("datname" =~ /^${datname:regex}$/ AND "host" =~ /^${host:regex}$/ AND "usename" =~ /^${usename:regex}$/) AND  $timeFilter GROUP BY "host", "datname", "usename", "queryid", "query_md5"
)
